concepts.term: capital W is the maximum bandwidth
projection profile can be expressed through the sampling kernel in terms of discrete sampling points P theta at k tau
filtering kernel, under the assumption of limited bandwidth capital W, can be expressed in terms of sampled values

evidence: Now we assume capital W is the maximum bandwidth. Because of that, we can use the sampling theorem.
The projection profile can be expressed through the sampling kernel in terms of discrete sampling points P theta at k tau-where tau is the sampling step.
Likewise, the filtering kernel, under the assumption of limited bandwidth capital W, can be expressed in terms of sampled values.
